actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Resolution authorizing and directing the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take immediate action to implement a plan for the audio and video broadcasting of House floor proceedings.

summary.text: Directs the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take immediate action to implement a plan for the audio and video broadcasting of House floor proceedings. Provides that the broadcasts be made available to commercial and public broadcasters. Prohibits the House, the Speaker, or the committee responsible for directing the program from exercising any control over the selection of materials for broadcast use.

titles.title: Resolution authorizing and directing the Speaker of the House of Representatives to take immediate action to implement a plan for the audio and video broadcasting of House floor proceedings.
